summary: Zweeti Fast Food Billing app — a mobile-friendly fast food billing web app. The user has provided a new reference HTML design ('ZWEETI Pro Billing') with updated styling: orange #ff5722 accent, white card on grey background, dashed table borders, a Print Bill button (green #4caf50), and a Download Bill button (blue #2196f3).
architectural_notes: Single-page HTML app with inline CSS and vanilla JS
Print bill hides buttons via @media print
Menu items updated per user reference: 13 items including Chaumin variants, Momos, Pasta, Rolls, and Burgers
New reference design uses grey body background (#f2f2f2), orange #ff5722 accent, dashed table borders, and a download button alongside print

existing_features.title: Create a fast food billing form with the following fields: Customer Name (text input), Item selector (dropdown with options: Burger ₹80, Pizza ₹150, Fries ₹60, Cold Drink ₹40), auto-populated Price (read-only), and Quantity (number input). Include an 'Add Item' button that appends the selected item to the bill table.
Display a bill summary table with columns: Item, Price (₹), Qty, and Total. Below the table show Subtotal, GST (5%), and Grand Total, all updated dynamically as items are added.
Include a 'Print Bill' button that triggers the browser's print dialog. All action buttons must be hidden during print so only the bill content is printed.

Apply a warm fast-food brand visual theme: deep orange (#e65100) as the primary accent color for headings, table headers, and primary buttons; green (#2e7d32) for the Print Bill button; a warm off-white/cream background (#fff3e0); white card container with rounded corners and subtle shadow. Typography should be clean and legible. Layout should be mobile-friendly, centered, max-width 500px.

Replace the existing menu item dropdown options in BillingForm.tsx with the following Zweeti menu items and prices: Chaumin ₹40, Paneer Chaumin ₹60, Mushroom Chaumin ₹60, Chilli Chaumin ₹50, Veg Momo ₹60, Paneer Momos ₹80, Veg Pasta ₹40, Paneer Pasta ₹60, Cream Pasta ₹60, Veg Roll ₹40, Paneer Roll ₹60, Veg Burger ₹30, Paneer Burger ₹50. Remove the old placeholder items (Burger ₹80, Pizza ₹150, Fries ₹60, Cold Drink ₹40).

Update the visual theme across App.tsx, BillingForm.tsx, and BillSummary.tsx to match the ZWEETI Pro reference design: use grey background (#f2f2f2) for the page, white card container (420px wide, rounded corners, box-shadow), orange accent #ff5722 for headings, table header backgrounds, and primary buttons, dashed borders for table rows, and a centered layout.

Add a 'Download Bill' button styled in blue (#2196f3) with white text, placed alongside the existing Print Bill button in the actions area of App.tsx. Clicking it should generate and download a plain-text or HTML representation of the current bill (customer name, items, subtotal, GST, grand total) as a file named 'zweeti-bill.txt'. The Download Bill button must also be hidden during print.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update menu items to match reference design: Chaumin ₹40, Paneer Chaumin ₹60, Mushroom Chaumin ₹60, Chilli Chaumin ₹50, Veg Momo ₹60, Paneer Momos ₹80, Veg Pasta ₹40, Paneer Pasta ₹60, Cream Pasta ₹60, Veg Roll ₹40, Paneer Roll ₹60, Veg Burger ₹30, Paneer Burger ₹50
Add a Download Bill button (blue #2196f3) alongside the Print Bill button
Update visual theme to match new reference: grey background (#f2f2f2), orange accent #ff5722, dashed table borders, 420px card width
